name: Xmas Syman
overview: Syman is a simple and fun memory game for all the family, playable by up to four people simultaneously. Syman is based on the original MB 'Simon' game, with inspiration drawn from the American Dad tv series, and is produced by a small team here at Ultimate Amiga. Simply watch the coloured tones played by Syman, and play them back. The game was started from scratch on 12/12/09 with the goal of being finished in time for the Underground Arcade Christmas Competition which closed on Christmas Eve 2009.
